content.p: UoNARI-M is hosted in the Faculty of Arts and Social Sciences (FASS). FASS brings together academics and students from a range of disciplines from all over the world. FASS members research, teach and study Asia from different perspectives, including: FASS offers a range of postgraduate courses all of which have Asia-relevant content. These include courses offered within The School of Politics History and International Relations and The School of Media, Languages and Cultures: telephone: +603 8924 8000 fax: +603 8924 8001 email: enquiries@nottingham.edu.my
